articles.description: Chelsea are reportedly considering former manager Jose Mourinho as a potential replacement for Graham Potter, who was recently dismissed due to poor results since his arrival a few months ago.

articles.title: IPL 2023 Orange Cap: Most runs so far this season - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Cricket News: Over the years, the Orange Cap in the IPL has become one of the most prestigious prizes, associated with batting excellence.
